subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Golden State offense — reckless, chaotic and a whole lot of fun — has become the star of this year’s N.B.A. playoffs, overshadowing even LeBron James, Steve Nash and Tim Duncan.
snippet: The Golden State offense — reckless, chaotic and a whole lot of fun — has become the star of this year’s N.B.A. playoffs, overshadowing even LeBron James, Steve Nash and Tim Duncan.
